name: Diorama Knight
summary: Welcome to dungeon in the basement of a board game board! This is a new type of battle game set in a cute diorama world. Control your knight to beat your rivals to the boss before they do! Set in the world of cute dioramas, this game has a new sense of nostalgia and depth! Based on strategy board games familiar since childhood, players compete for underground treasure. In addition to online matches, playing with close friends such as parents and children or couples every day will make the game progress. You don't have to be scared to hear it's a strategy game. Why don't you start a new hobby with your close friends?
